AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: welwa trainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Somewhat skilled with animals, and secretly terrified of echatere, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to instead put [PAWN_possessive] skills to work training welwa. While comparatively safer to be around than echatere, [PAWN_nameDef] did nearly lose fingers a few times.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: echatere tender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't skilled enough to actually tame echatere, [PAWN_pronoun] did help tend the herds. Taking care of echatere was tough work, as echatere aren't very friendly, even 'tame' ones. [PAWN_nameDef] was sure [PAWN_pronoun] spent more time tending to wounds than actually taking care of the echatere.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: echatere tamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few Orsimer brave enough to tame wild echatere. [PAWN_pronoun] was also smart enough to know that even a tame echatere was still wild.
